dashboard.control

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • acm.graphics.GObject
      • acm.graphics.GCompound
        • dashboard.control.MouseWidget
          • dashboard.control.Group
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    acm.graphics.GContainer, acm.graphics.GScalable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomGroup

    public abstract class Group
extends MouseWidget
    Provides the base functionality for a container widget that can hold other widgets. The purpose is to group widgets so as to make them easier to manage/move, as well as make it easier to extend the library with more widget types.
    Author:
    Mark Sabini
